name: God's Trigger
summary: Slay enemies with speed and precision in an over-the-top show of blood and explosions. Play solo or with others, make split-second decisions, dodge bullets, and use weapons and abilities to inflict violence in the most graphic way possible.
info:
• 发行: Techland Publishing
  • 别名: 神之扳机
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ACT
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2019-04-18
  • 官方网站: https://godstriggergame.com/
  • 开发: One More Level
